review: Has a lot of options, does AirPlay, is from Apple... seems to have it all.  That is, until you need to update it!  Say good bye to the next 30-45 minutes while it does it's thing so it can bring you another menu item you'll never use.  Seriously, if they are thinking about next iteration, they might want to add some processing power and storage performance to this device.  I refuse to believe these updates should be taking so long when they deliver so little in return.  I've since bought a Roku 3 and have yet to need to reboot the device AT ALL, whilest the ATV needed continual maintenance when it came to running Netflix for me reliably.  Giving up paid off, I guess.
